entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
